content.raw:
I'm going to have a look at this now. The code for this is a complete mess because it was one of the first things I wrote while trying to learn Qt...I'll see if I can improve it.

It is worth noting that the behaviour may be different between windows and linux/OSX due to the behaviour of [`QDrag.exec()`](http://doc.qt.io/qt-4.8/qdrag.html#exec) which blocks on windows and doesn't on linux/OSX!
